I know she agreed to let the devices be implanted, I aint dumb. What I 
want to know is if she agreed to let you control BN like you do right 
now. If she implicitely did (like this: LN, you can control BN for 
now) then fine for you. If not, then it's up to the council to 
decide if it's moding...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> If I can ill find the email in which Airly agreed to have BK be 
implanted

the 
> devices have certain failsafes to make her return to the base
